metadata.name: Shiburai Kimono #1
metadata.description: The first-generation Kimono is now live to mint for a limited time! Each first-gen Kimono has unique utility in coming games, in shared spaces, and across platforms. The Kimono is currently sold out. More will become available to mint in game and in shared spaces in the future. Holders will also receive a limited edition, in-game armour set and mint discounts.
